UCI Foundation





Home






 
You made a mountain out of an anthill!

Our seventh annual Giving Day was a tremendous success! On April 18, our Anteater community came together to raise over $2 million to further programs and initiatives across campus and UCI Health.





Highlights


Get Involved, Anteaters!

Be part of the thousands of engaged UCI alumni
Engaging with your alma mater benefits not only you but the entire UCI community, including current students. Explore the ways the UCI Alumni Association is working for you, and how you can enjoy its rewards and give back too.
Learn more



News

Khouri-Hayde gift to support new UCI Health – Irvine medical campus
Laura Khouri and Michael K. Hayde, longtime supporters of UCI, gifted $7.25 million to support the new UCI Health — Irvine medical campus and the university’s integrative health programs. The gift will advance innovation and research in the medical field.
Read more»



Why I Give

There are many reasons to support UCI
An alumna of the School of Education, Vicki Vasques '81 shares why she gives to her alma mater. Vicki has had an illustrious career in education, first as a teacher and later in the U.S. Department of Education. She credits part of her success to her time at UCI and her mentor Mary Roosevelt.
Watch the video »



UCI Magazine

Flood Watchers
Read this edition of the UCI Magazine to learn how researchers used a new flood modeling and mapping method to determine the impact a massive 100-year flood might cause in Los Angeles.
